comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*

The correct precedent was described by George Washington, and confirmed by president Polk. (These are my memories of the essence of communications from the 2 presidents. Their exact words, as reported by historians, were much more precise and binding.)

> A president has a right to keep records of private deliberations on foreign policy, but if the House passes Articles of Impeachment, then the congressional oversight clause gives Congress or its committees rights of complete access to any and all presidential records. No president can object to this.

And from President Polk.

> In response to the request from the House committee investigating impeachment, All of the records of my administration are now open for the committee and is staff to peruse. They will find nothing wrong. If they do find evidence of impropriety, it was done by my staff without my knowledge or permission, and I welcome the prosecution of corrupt officials.

Donald Trump claims to represent the truth, but he refuses to let it come out.

His supporters should ask themselves why Donald Trump is so afraid of the truth?

The answer is simple: he is afraid that everyone will find out what a fraud he is. The worst president in the history of the United States who remains the greatest opponent of American democracy.

What are the Republicans waiting for to leave him aside by privileging again the American democracy to the political strategy?
And he will succeed.  Again.  SMH.
Can't imagine why ??¿¿
You guys are obsessed with this. Nothing substantial is going to come out of this.
So not about Executive Privilege after all. Who whoulda thunk it?
Keep looking and you may find Hillary’s 33 thousand e mails
Nail this traitor !!!
How about his fucking taxes?
I wish someone would just leak this staff. Hack it, steal it, whatever.
Oh jeeze, he wrote a post coup speech thanking them for making him emperor.
Can’t Biden “executive order” their release?
Who cares what he wants
Speech. Drafts. Now.

Let's not forget the minority party and senators that supported this traitor in office.

Why would people have faith in leaders that seem sublimely uninterested in completely unveiling the deadly riot that put members of the Executive and Legislative Branch within the reach of people with murderous intent?

E - I look forward to any upcoming interviews from McCarthy and McConnell on the subject
wonder if he is hiding em since they are written with crayons
terrorists of america =GOP
Dear r/conservative, innocent people don’t do this.
mindless turds clog up pipes all the time
Genuine question. How and why is he still able to delay so effectively while out of power? At this point could they not just refuse his attempts to block and move along with the investigation?

Once again Donald is treating the Office of the President as if it were part of Trump Org.

Just like he said he would show us his taxes and never has and is fighting to keep them hidden we are reminded when Trump stated that his was the most "transparent Presidency in history."   Of course he is keeping everything secret as to what he was transparent about.
His hand really does look tiny on that image
Release them publicly. Along with the full mueller report.
He’ll keep obstructing until he dies.  As a free man.  And the country will never see justice.
Trump ain’t guilty of shit my God let it go already

At this point trump could come out and announce he fully intended to overthrow the government and kill everyone only for the GQP to turn around and go "well he didn't succeed so there's no crime and so we can't do anything about it."
Unfortunately, this is much ado about nothing.  With everything that’s already been uncovered amounting to zero accountability for those involved, this will just result in wishful thinking.

Can we get a final ruling on this bullshit executive priviledge claim, like by Monday of next week? Why does this clearly bullshit defense by someone who isn't in office anymore have to take years to go through the courts?
A quick spoiler for everyone here: he’s going to get away with it
Lock him up!  Lock him up!

So now he's given them the list of things they need, to show his guilt beyond any doubt?  Cool.

edit: added a comma.
Speech drafts, oh boy! I bet those would be interesting!
Oh my god. I would so love to see the level of crazy in his “I just overthrew the government” victory speech. Just happy we never had to hear it. And hoping we never will….
Huge news. Make them public.

Trump has made crime legal at the federal level.  I doubt the DoJ has the spine to pursue insurrection charges even though the evidence for it is overwhelming.  I fear only states like NY and Georgia can save us by enforcing their laws.
What the hell does a draft of speech have to do with national security?
Hitler
Fuck trump he is always on this fucking sub

If the government arrest Donald Trump for Jan 6 I’m almost sure the republicans will raise arms against the US. They legitimately think they did nothing wrong and Trump had nothing to do with it. That’s ignorant of course but republicans just believe what they want. Heck when you bring up the destruction they caused in the capitol building their excuse is “well they let us in!” “They wanted us to do that!” Oh yea then why were there armed guards trying to keep people out? And even if there were a few cops who said “you have the right to go in there, go ahead.”  Those were surely republicans Lol. Delusional.
Why can’t Biden just make everything unclassified like trump used to do
ah, yes. the actions of an innocent man.

The con this mobster had mastered is using the US legal system against the US itself,

as he chortles through his fat orange-tainted turkey neck...
Don key Con. Dumbest mother fucker ever!!!
Definitely the actions of an innocent man
Shouldn't he be detained by now?

The ridiculous filing:

https://www.politico.com/f/?id=0000017c-cf85-dddc-a77e-cf97936f0000
